channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- NGINX Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- NGINX Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-1550|2024-08-02T05:49:11.695Z -- f5 -- nginx%20agent
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into log file vulnerability in NGINX Agent. NGINX Agent version 2.0 before 2.23.3 inserts sensitive information into a log file. An authenticated attacker with local access to read agent log files may gain access to private keys. This issue is only exposed when the non-default trace level logging is enabled. Note: NGINX Agent is included with NGINX Instance Manager and used in conjunction with NGINX API Connectivity Manager, and NGINX Management Suite Security Monitoring.
